name: MTLRenderPassStencilAttachmentDescriptor
desc: A stencil render target that serves as the output destination for stencil pixels generated by a render pass.

items.name: var stencilResolveFilter: MTLMultisampleStencilResolveFilter
items.desc: The filter used for stencil multisample resolve.

items.name: enum MTLMultisampleStencilResolveFilter
items.desc: Constants used to control the multisample stencil resolve operation.

items.name: var clearStencil: UInt32
items.desc: The value to use when clearing the stencil attachment.
